other_tests.findings: Left kidney was atrophic; right kidney was normal except for a single cortical cyst of 12-mm diameter.
Only the right kidney was functional.
Increased plasma level of /H9253-glutamyl transpeptidase (up to 4.4 times the upper value of normal range).
Bilateral renal atrophy with multiple microcysts.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Renal function improved within the following weeks; creatininemia was 50 at 2 and 6 months of age, and 88 at 4.5 years of age.

other_tests.findings: Heterozygous duplication of the fifth exon of TCF2 was identified in the proband and two other affected relatives.
